summary: A better looking retexture for the vampire armors added by Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
This mod aims to provide a much more visually appealing look for Dawnguard's vampire armors. At the moment it retextures each variant of the basic vampire armor, plus the Vampire Royal Armor worn by Harkon, Valerica, and Serana.

In future, I may also retexture the rarely seen vampire clothes, and add higher definition textures.

As you may guess, requires Dawnguard.

These textures are meant to be performance friendly, but higher definition ones should be available soon.

Please feel free to add your own screenshots and constructive criticism- I'm still relatively new to retexturing, so this may not be the best work you have ever seen.


UPDATE: High-Definition Textures, based on the ones in the Official Hi-Res DLC have been added as an optional file- these should hopefully provide a better look than the default textures that will do until someone with more experience than me creates one. The original version is still available for users with lower-spec computers (or if, for some bizarre reason, you prefer them)
author: R97R
